sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting"> <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <code_url/> <code_url_2/> <details/> <example_steps/> <example_url/> <module/> <number>SNSCRIPT0001068</number> <replaced_by/> <script>In the dictionary attributes on the caller_id field: ref_auto_completer=AJAXTableCompleter,ref_ac_display_value=false,ref_ac_columns=first_name;last_name;employee_number;company;location;title,ref_ac_order_by=first_name;last_name,ref_ac_columns_search  You can just add this in a record producer to the refernece variable ref_ac_columns=first_name;last_name;employee_number;company;location;title,ref_ac_order_by=first_name;last_name,ref_ac_columns_search </script> <script_2/> <script_type/> <short_description>Setting up display and "starts with" fields for a refernce field, such as caller_id on HR Case form.</short_description> <state>Submitted</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-08-28 18:39:11</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1fb467cd13e56240e5adbd522244b0a8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-08-28 18:39:11</sys_updated_on> <tested_on_helsinki/> </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting> </record_update>
